pkgmetadata.longdescription: Another Plot PACKage: stem.leaf, bagplot, faces, spin3R, plotsummary, plothulls, and some slider functions // set of functions for drawing some special plots: stem.leaf plots a stem and leaf plot, stem.leaf.backback plots back-to-back versions of stem and leafs, bagplot plots a bagplot, skyline.hist plots several histgramm in one plot of a one dimensional data set, plotsummary plots a graphical summary of a data set with one or more variables, plothulls plots sequentially hulls of a bivariate data set, faces plots chernoff faces, spin3R for an inspection of a 3-dim point cloud, slider functions for interactive graphics.
